body:
Hey Everyone, 
Last night in all of my social medias I asked this (https://twitter.com/shadowolfYT/status/806132486149390338) if you haven't followed me on any social media *cough* sellout *cough* The tweet is basically taking about would you like Minecraft Account giveaways on my channel. It would happen at least every month. 

What are your thoughts and should I do it?

title: Would you be interested? - Giveaways

replies.body: I think you should but to enter you will have to be an active SUBSCRIBER. this way you can grow your channel
replies.body_tagged: I think you should but to enter you will have to be an active SUBSCRIBER. this way you can grow your channel

replies.body: Like what Sam said, have some sort of requirement that benefits you. Would like to see one myself.
replies.body_tagged: Like what Sam said, have some sort of requirement that benefits you. Would like to see one myself.

replies.body: This would require you to buy accounts every month right? Great idea but a little expensive in my opinion.
replies.body_tagged: This would require you to buy accounts every month right? Great idea but a little expensive in my opinion.

replies.body:
"This would require you to buy accounts every month"
Yeah, it would but I would usually do a 50/50 match with my parents :)
